landing_description: A reusable monorepo with authentication, authorization, and authenticated user management. Built for production-ready SaaS apps.
landing_feature_auth_desc: Email/password sign-up and login, session refresh, forgot password, and optional Google OAuth.
landing_feature_authz_desc: Protected API routes with Bearer tokens and optional role-based access (RBAC).
landing_feature_user_desc: Profile and account settings, password change, and account deletion.
landing_cta_description: Sign in or create an account to access the dashboard and start from a clean, authenticated baseline.
